verses.verse: <S%G1895>Forasmuch<s%> as <S%G4183>many<s%> have taken in <S%G2021>hand<s%> to set forth in <S%G392>order<s%> a <S%G1335>declaration<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> those <S%G4229>things<s%> which are most surely <S%G4135>believed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>,

<S%G2531>Even<s%> as they <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them unto <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G845>eyewitnesses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5257>ministers<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%>;

It <S%G1380>seemed<s%> good to me <S%G2504>also<s%>, having had <S%G199>perfect<s%> <S%G3877>understanding<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%> from the very <S%G509>first<s%>, to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> in <S%G2517>order<s%>, most <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G2321>Theophilus<s%>,
<S%G2443>That<s%> thou mightest <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G803>certainty<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> those <S%G3056>things<s%>, <S%G3739>wherein<s%> thou hast been <S%G2727>instructed<s%>.

Â¶ There <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod<s%>, the <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>, a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%>, <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2183>course<s%> of <S%G7>Abia<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> was <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2364>daughters<s%> of <S%G2>Aaron<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G1665>Elisabeth<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G4198>walking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1345>ordinances<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G273>blameless<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%>, <S%G2530>because<s%> that <S%G1665>Elisabeth<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4723>barren<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> now well <S%G4260>stricken<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2250>years<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> executed the priest's <S%G2407>office<s%> <S%G1725>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2183>course<s%>,

<S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G1485>custom<s%> of the priest's <S%G2405>office<s%>, his <S%G2975>lot<s%> was to burn <S%G2370>incense<s%> when he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> at the <S%G5610>time<s%> of <S%G2368>incense<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G3700>appeared<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>side<s%> of the <S%G2379>altar<s%> of <S%G2368>incense<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, he was <S%G5015>troubled<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%>: <S%G1360>for<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> is <S%G1522>heard<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G1665>Elisabeth<s%> shall <S%G1080>bear<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4671>thou<s%> shalt <S%G2071>have<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G20>gladness<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1083>birth<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3364>neither<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> strong <S%G4608>drink<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he shall be <S%G4130>filled<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>, <S%G2089>even<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> shall he <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G2071>thou<s%> shalt be <S%G4623>dumb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%>, <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> shall be <S%G1096>performed<s%>, <S%G473%G3739>because<s%> thou <S%G4100>believest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> shall be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2540>season<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2258%G4328>waited<s%> for <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2296>marvelled<s%> <S%G1722>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> tarried so <S%G5549>long<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when he came <S%G1831>out<s%>, he <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1921>perceived<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had <S%G3708>seen<s%> a <S%G3701>vision<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>: <S%G2532>for<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2258%G1269>beckoned<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1265>remained<s%> <S%G2974>speechless<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that, as soon <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3009>ministration<s%> were <S%G4130>accomplished<s%>, he <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>.

<S%G3754><s%><S%G3779>Thus<s%> <S%G4160>hath<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4160>dealt<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3739>wherein<s%> he looked <S%G1896>on<s%> me, to take <S%G851>away<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3681>reproach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when she <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, she was <S%G1298>troubled<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> cast in her <S%G1260>mind<s%> what <S%G4217>manner<s%> of <S%G783>salutation<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> should <S%G1498>be<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G3137>Mary<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> thou hast <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5485>favour<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, thou shalt <S%G4815>conceive<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> thy <S%G1064>womb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> bring <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shalt <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2424>JESUS<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%>, <S%G1893>seeing<s%> I <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%>, The <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> shall <S%G1904>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G5310>Highest<s%> shall <S%G1982>overshadow<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>: <S%G1352>therefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that holy <S%G40>thing<s%> which shall be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
